about_the_game:
Are you ready for a puzzle game unlike any other? Look no further than "The Riddler", an intellectual conversation game that will challenge your mind and transport you to a world of intrigue and mystery.

The true magic of "The Riddler" lies in the thrilling experience of interaction with a powerful artificial intelligence (based on ChatGPT) that is specifically tuned for crafting riddles on the fly and speaking about the subjects of those riddles.

This means that every time you play, you will encounter brand new challenges that will keep you on your toes and test your puzzle-solving skills to the limit.

Immerse yourself in a world of diverse characters, each with their own unique style of dialogue and riddles. As you engage in dialogue with them, you will feel like you're having a conversation with a real person.

🌟 "The Riddler" offers two gameplay modes: 🌟
  • The classic mode is perfect for those who crave a challenge, with a limit of 3 questions per riddle, a limit on wrong answers, and a ticking game timer to keep you on your toes.
  • In "free for all" mode you have the freedom to skip riddles, ask unlimited questions, and even use a text prompt to specify a unique subject for riddles to be crafted for you.

🌟 Fascinating Facts About The Riddler Game 🌟
Did you know that "The Riddler" is not just another puzzle game, but a groundbreaking fusion of AI and human creativity? Check out these intriguing facts:

1️⃣ ChatGPT, a state-of-the-art AI language model, conceived the game's idea, showcasing the power of AI in creative brainstorming.
2️⃣ Every element of the game art, including UI and characters, was initially generated by AI and later refined by artists, blending technology and craftsmanship.
3️⃣ AI played a substantial role in developing the game code, demonstrating the potential for AI-human collaboration in the gaming industry.
4️⃣ Even this very page description was crafted with the help of AI, highlighting the versatility of artificial intelligence in various applications.

Experience "The Riddler" and witness the incredible synergy of human and artificial intelligence!

Need help or have inquiries? Drop me a line at semanticoverlord@gmail.com
